ygData.subject: Re: Enchanting Weapons/Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: actually i think once they get the enchantment of light spell you could probably use that on ore and make it enchanted that way that is if we ever get to see
ygData.messageBody:
actually i think once they get the enchantment of light spell you could
probably use that on ore and make it enchanted that way that is if we ever
get to see the enchantment of light spell.


aldron
